snippet.title: Kpop-Academy Trailer
snippet.description:
Become the manager of the new sensation of the dazzling universe of K-Pop. Train, feed and talk to a bunch of talented trainees that will work their way into Stardom under your management. Are you ready to create the next K-Pop legends?

BUILD the boy band alignment of your dreams. Idols come in all shapes and sizes.

CUSTOMIZE their academy to your taste.

LAUNCH concerts to captivate audiences with your talented team.

INTERACT with your idols! See that they eat, train, and rest well, and why not, get to know them better.

Manage the daily lives of adorable idols and guide them to international fame in your K-Pop Academy!

➮ PRE REGISTER HERE
https://hyperbeard.com/game/k-pop-academy/…
